row.process:
:SET &UC# =""
:PRINT "Extract Use Case to Process"
:SET &RC# = STR_FIND(&TEXT01#, "UC=THALES_STORE.ADD") :IF &RC# NE 0 : PRINT "Use Case to process is : THALES_STORE.ADD" : SET &UC# = "THALES_STORE.ADD" :ENDIF
:SET &RC# = STR_FIND(&TEXT01#, "UC=ENV_PROV.ADD") :IF &RC# NE 0 : PRINT "Use Case to process is : ENV_PROV.ADD" : SET &UC# = "ENV_PROV.ADD" :ENDIF
:SET &RC# = STR_FIND(&TEXT01#, "UC=RADIUS.ADD") :IF &RC# NE 0 : PRINT "Use Case to process is : RADIUS.ADD" : SET &UC# = "RADIUS.ADD" :ENDIF
:SET &RC# = STR_FIND(&TEXT01#, "UC=SAT_SRV_INGE.ADD") :IF &RC# NE 0 : PRINT "Use Case to process is : SAT_SRV_INGE.ADD" : SET &UC# = "SAT_SRV_INGE.ADD" :ENDIF
:PUBLISH &UC#,,"TOP"
